pullRequest.body:
In order to achieve this, `finsuppTensorFinsupp` and `TensorProduct.directSum` are also heterobasic now.

nodes.body: @erdOne can you confirm that in practice you just generalized `Basis.tensorProduct` and fixed what broke?
`finsuppTensorFinsupp` and `TensorProduct.directSum` were also generalized to achieve this. I've updated the PR message.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

nodes.body: @erdOne can you confirm that in practice you just generalized `Basis.tensorProduct` and fixed what broke?
`finsuppTensorFinsupp` and `TensorProduct.directSum` were also generalized to achieve this. I've updated the PR message.
